ValidationRule.description: when users select the PEO-ASO Hold Out checkbox they must supply an expiration date, unless permanent holdout description is Strategic Account Team
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")) && ISBLANK(TEXT( PEO_ASO_Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c))&& Premier_PBS_Hold_Out__c = true && ISBLANK( Premier_PBS_Hold_Out_Expiration__c )&& (NOT ISPICKVAL(Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c, "Strategic Account Team") && NOT ISPICKVAL(Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c, "PEO Expansion"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: **** You are required to set the PEO-ASO Hold out Expiration date when checking the Hold out checkbox ****
